title: Red velvet chocolate chip cookies
ingredients: ['190g plain flour', '30g cocoa powder', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '115g butter, softened', '115g brown sugar', '50g caster sugar', '1 egg', '1 1/2 tablespoons milk', '1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '2 tablespoons red food colouring', '170g dark chocolate chips, or as needed']
